barista_record.SQL_SELECT: SELECT arc_cashcode.firm_id, arc_cashcode.record_id_c, arc_cashcode.cash_rec_cd, arc_cashcode.code_desc, ars_cc_custsvc.use_custsvc_cc, ars_cc_custsvc.interface_tp, ars_cc_custsvc.gateway_id[$0a$]FROM arc_cashcode[$0a$]LEFT JOIN ars_cc_custsvc ON ars_cc_custsvc.firm_id=arc_cashcode.firm_id AND ars_cc_custsvc.cash_rec_cd=arc_cashcode.cash_rec_cd

SELECT art_invdet.firm_id, art_invdet.ar_type, art_invdet.customer_id, art_invdet.ar_inv_no, art_invdet.sequence_num, art_invdet.trans_type, art_invdet.refchk_no, art_invdet.trans_date, art_invdet.trans_amt, art_invdet.adjdisc_amt[$0a$]FROM art_invdet

SELECT art_cashhdr.firm_id, art_cashhdr.ar_type, art_cashhdr.reserved_key_01, art_cashhdr.customer_id, art_cashhdr.receipt_date, art_cashhdr.cash_rec_cd, arc_cashcode.code_desc, art_cashhdr.ar_check_no, art_cashhdr.aba_no, art_cashhdr.reserved_key_02, art_cashhdr.payment_amt[$0a$]FROM art_cashhdr[$0a$]LEFT JOIN arc_cashcode ON arc_cashcode.firm_id=art_cashhdr.firm_id AND arc_cashcode.cash_rec_cd=art_cashhdr.cash_rec_cd[$0a$]
